channel.title: Joe Buhlig
channel.description: leverage the digital and welcome real life

item.title: 12: The Opposite of What I Needed but Exactly What I Wanted
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: Joe gets a new podcasting setup. Drew talks about his latest experience working with pen and paper. A book sparks a conversation around the future of reading, note-keeping, and the often-discussed subject of input.
item.content:encoded: Joe gets a new podcasting setup. Drew talks about his latest experience working with pen and paper. A book sparks a conversation around the future of reading, note-keeping, and the often-discussed subject of input.

item.title: 29: Welcome to the Productivity Guild Podcast
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: Theoretical Accountability is now rebranded to The Productivity Guild Podcast. At the same time, Josh is now losing weight. And Joe is potentially staying solo.
item.content:encoded: Theoretical Accountability is now rebranded to The Productivity Guild Podcast. At the same time, Josh is now losing weight. And Joe is potentially staying solo.

item.title: 11: Paper Works
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: This week Drew and I go into some more depth about paper and why it is becoming a go-to tool for me. Yes, I’m addicted.
item.content:encoded: This week Drew and I go into some more depth about paper and why it is becoming a go-to tool for me. Yes, I’m addicted.

item.title: 28: Analog Podcasting
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: Josh gets fancy with his shaving. He’s also removing peanut butter. Joe likes video calls. Even as a millennial, he prefers the face-to-face meetings. Weird. Oh, and Joe played with OmniPlan.
item.content:encoded: Josh gets fancy with his shaving. He’s also removing peanut butter. Joe likes video calls. Even as a millennial, he prefers the face-to-face meetings. Weird. Oh, and Joe played with OmniPlan.

item.title: 36: Paid to Think by David Goldsmith
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: It’s time to tackle our latest textbook. It was a listener recommendation and has a lot to talk about. So we’re glad this episode didn’t end up being 5 hours long.
item.content:encoded: It’s time to tackle our latest textbook. It was a listener recommendation and has a lot to talk about. So we’re glad this episode didn’t end up being 5 hours long.

item.title: 27: Season 3 Goals
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: Joe is fighting with Office 365. Josh is carrying over goals. And Theoretical Accountability is making some big changes.
item.content:encoded: Joe is fighting with Office 365. Josh is carrying over goals. And Theoretical Accountability is making some big changes.

item.title: 26: Season 2 Post-Mortem
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: It’s time to be honest and see what Josh and Joe accomplished (or failed to accomplish) over the last 12 weeks. The results are mostly dumpster fires with occasional kittens sprinkled on top.
item.content:encoded: It’s time to be honest and see what Josh and Joe accomplished (or failed to accomplish) over the last 12 weeks. The results are mostly dumpster fires with occasional kittens sprinkled on top.

item.title: 10: I’m Going to Have a Problem Tomorrow Because I’m Saying This Now
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: Drew went on a cruise, and worked at sea. Joe did NOT enjoy the redesign of a certain productivity app. The two share computer horror stories (though one of them has frustratingly never had any real problems), and Joe reveals a major new ‘experiment’.
item.content:encoded: Drew went on a cruise, and worked at sea. Joe did NOT enjoy the redesign of a certain productivity app. The two share computer horror stories (though one of them has frustratingly never had any real problems), and Joe reveals a major new ‘experiment’.

item.title: 25: Do Not Disturb While Podcasting
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: Josh is making last minute changes. Joe has a theory on goal-setting. And season two isn’t looking good as we hit the home stretch.
item.content:encoded: Josh is making last minute changes. Joe has a theory on goal-setting. And season two isn’t looking good as we hit the home stretch.

item.title: 35: The Art of Asking by Amanda Palmer
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: Mike has a bone to pick with Joe on this one. Let’s just say this was a very fun, passionate conversation about a book that turned out to be much different than expected.
item.content:encoded: Mike has a bone to pick with Joe on this one. Let’s just say this was a very fun, passionate conversation about a book that turned out to be much different than expected.

item.title: 9: Can’t You Just Say What the ‘Content’ Is??
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: Drew thinks “content” is a dirty word. Joe thinks giving two hours every week to pondering questions seems like a whole lot of time. Also, more conversation on space for silence.
item.content:encoded: Drew thinks “content” is a dirty word. Joe thinks giving two hours every week to pondering questions seems like a whole lot of time. Also, more conversation on space for silence.

item.title: 24: What to Do If You Get Screwed
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: Josh is now a sitter. Joe got ripped off. And that means this episode goes into legal conversation and the woes of doing freelance work online.
item.content:encoded: Josh is now a sitter. Joe got ripped off. And that means this episode goes into legal conversation and the woes of doing freelance work online.

item.title: 23: It's Raining Sharks
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: Let’s just say Josh gets fired up this round. Thus, an explicit rating is required. In the end, we all need to learn how to work together on teams. Oh! And Josh invented a new rating.
item.content:encoded: Let’s just say Josh gets fired up this round. Thus, an explicit rating is required. In the end, we all need to learn how to work together on teams. Oh! And Josh invented a new rating.

item.title: 34: Think and Grow Rich by Napoleon Hill
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: This week Mike and Joe talk about money. And they talk about thinking about attracting money. We know. Complicated. But it rates well.
item.content:encoded: This week Mike and Joe talk about money. And they talk about thinking about attracting money. We know. Complicated. But it rates well.

item.title: 8: It’s All Hacked Together
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: Bread followup! Ulysses. Workflows, Launch Center Pro, URL schemes, and the very different ways that Drew and Joe view these tools.
item.content:encoded: Bread followup! Ulysses. Workflows, Launch Center Pro, URL schemes, and the very different ways that Drew and Joe view these tools.
